HomePage.name: Tomas Laprovitta
HomePage.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
HomePage.description: Hello! I am a Bachelor in Business Administration and a Full Stack Web Developer. This combination of skills allows me to tackle technology and business challenges from a comprehensive perspective.

Technologies.React: React is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces for web and mobile applications.
Technologies.Nextjs: Next.js is a JavaScript framework for building fast and easy-to-develop web and mobile applications.
Technologies.Tailwind_CSS: Tailwind CSS is a CSS framework that provides tools to create high-quality user interface designs.
Technologies.JavaScript: JavaScript is an interpreted programming language that allows creating interactive and dynamic applications.
Technologies.TypeScript: TypeScript is a programming language based on JavaScript with static typing.
Technologies.CSS: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a styling language for web documents.
Technologies.HTML: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is a markup language for web pages.
Technologies.Nodejs: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment for the server.
Technologies.Expressjs: Express.js is a Node.js framework for creating fast and scalable web applications.
Technologies.MongoDB: MongoDB is a document-oriented NoSQL database.
Technologies.PostgreSQL: PostgreSQL is a scalable relational database.
